thread.title: Ariana Grande's Long Hair Channels Rapunzel in New Video
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande's Long Hair Channels Rapunzel in New Video

title: Ariana Grande's Long Hair Channels Rapunzel in New Video
text: February 3, 2017 Getty Images Ariana Grande's long hair is killing it in her new “Everyday" music video, and when we say long, we think it's the longest we’ve ever seen on Ariana—or anyone for that matter—in quite some time. Yesterday, Ariana posted a photo of her seemingly endless brunette hair extensions on Instagram . But to keep things fun (we're talking about Ariana, so of course it's never really serious), the pop singer paired her new look with bangs and two buns on top of her head. At the end of the video, Ariana takes off her oversize puffer coat and turns to her right so we can get a full view of the extraordinary length of Ariana’s latest look. Her hair actually extends past her butt. Yes, it's the definition of looong hair, don’t care. You May Also Like
